name: i went to BAR SK and all i played was this dumb videogame
name_original: i went to BAR SK and all i played was this dumb videogame
description:
everyone was making games about beer but i wanted to make something about BAR SK itself, so this is a videogame about that time Dayv and I got into a fist fight to determine if i'm banned from the bar (this 100% happened i wouldn't make it up)

-----------------------

controls:

DAYV - A+S

ANDY - K+L

also the music is from street fighter and rub rabbits lmao
